titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for payment of the duty of excise, together with the arrears thereof
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, and Christopher Barker Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall the twenty sixth day of September, in the Twelfth year of Our Reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
